sections.title: Anchorite of Dawn (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Anchorite of Dawn class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Solar Invocation (Su) (Anchorite of Dawn)
sections.description: Grants competence bonuses to attack rolls, damage rolls, and spell DCs against evil creatures while outdoors in light and presenting a holy symbol or scimitar. Duration based on class level and Charisma modifier.

sections.title: Credence (Anchorite of Dawn)
sections.description: Customizable class features chosen every 2 levels starting at 2nd level that enhance combat abilities, expand solar invocation, or improve existing class features.

sections.title: Bask in Radiance (Su) (Anchorite of Dawn)
sections.description: Allows the anchorite to share solar invocation bonuses with any number of allies within 30 feet for the duration of the ability.

sections.title: Sunbeam (Sp) (Anchorite of Dawn)
sections.description: Grants the ability to cast sunbeam as a spell-like ability once per day at 7th level, twice per day at 10th level, with caster level equal to Hit Dice.

sections.title: Invocation of Dawn (Su) (Anchorite of Dawn)
sections.description: Enhanced version of solar invocation usable once per day for 1 minute that works indoors/underground and increases all bonuses by 1 without consuming daily rounds.
